titleStmt.title: SII 7.139: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 139. (A.R. No. 126 of 1900). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . coḻakeraḷadevaṟku yāṇṭu munṟāvatu milāṭāna janaṉātavaḷaṉāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu brahmadeyam tirukkovalūr tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvārkku
Ivvūr paruṭaiyāruḷ bhāradvāji Ūran vāsudevan tan=nuṭaiya mātā māṟi poṟkāḷinaṅkaikkāka vaitta tirunun=tāviḷak konṟukku vaitta cāvā muvā perāṭu toṇṇuṟṟāṟu Ivvāṭu kaikkoṇṭu Ivviḷakku
Onṟum can=tirātittaval Erikkakkaṭavom stānattu vaikā nasarom . Ivvāṇṭey jananātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu tirukkovalūr sabhaiyom vāṇakoppāṭiyāna marutān=takavaḷanāṭṭup peṇṇai vaṭakarai brahmadeyam maṇalūr paruṭaiyā
ruḷ kaucika Aṇṇāvan tiruvikkiramanukku viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Ivvūr melvarappulattu kayaṟkāṇi taṭi Iraṇṭināl karutteṭṭumāviluṅ kiḻakkaṭaiyak kāl nikki meṟkaṭaiya munṟu māvum viṟpataṟkku kiḻpāṟkellai Ikkayaṟkāṇi kiḻakka⌈
ṭaiya niṅkuṅ kāṟceykku meṟkum tenpāṟkellai Ivvūr bhāradvāji nakkanārāyaṇan Uḷḷiṭṭāruṭaiya kuṉṟinkiḻk kāṟceykku vaṭakkum melpārkkellai tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvār tiruvamutupuṟattuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai vaidyapokattukku pāyn=ta vāykkā
lukkut teṟkkum Innāṉkellaikkum Uḷppaṭṭa Innilam muṉṟumāvum 3 1/20 kuṭuttu Iṉnilattu Innilattukku vilaidravyamum Iṟaidravyamum kaiyyile poruḷaṟakkoṇṭu Innilam Iṟai Iḻicci viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇam ceytukuṭuttom
Ivvūr sabhaiyom Aṇṇāvan tirivikkiramaṉukku Innilam kayaṟkāṇiyil muṉṟu māvum tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvārkkuk koṇṭu kuṭutteṉ Aṇṇāvan tiruvikkiramaneṉ Iṉnilam kaikkoṇṭu ceyyum niman=tamāvatu Ayppacit tiruvoṇam tiruveṭṭai nāḷ tiruveṭṭai
Eḻun=taruḷippukun=tu Ittiruvolakkattil Amutuceyya AppaAmutukku Arici kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum ney yirunāḻiyum veḷḷikallāl nāṟpatin palac caṟkaraiyum koṇṭu nūṟu AppaAmutu camaittu ceyvippatākavum Aṭaikkāyamutu nūṟum veṟṟilai Āṟu paṟṟum ko
ṇṭu Amutuceyvittu Ittiruvolakkattil tirune
ṭun=tāṇṭakam viṇṇappam ceyvaārkku Oru kācu Iṭu
vatākavum Innilam koṇṭu Iniman=tam ceyyakkaṭavom
stānattu vaikāsanarom .
Digital edition of SII 7.139 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
